branchItem.name: 11/22-MHR2
branchItem.description: Series 11/22-M(D)HR2 gripper features high precision centering and high repeatability in a clean series 2 finger rotary actuated air gripper.

branchItem.name: 11/22-M(D)HR3
branchItem.description: <P>Series 11/22-M(D)HR3, a 3-finger rotary actuated clean series gripper, features high precision centering and high repeatability. A double acting rotary actuator and precision ball bearings permit smooth action without vibration. This series is applicable for clean room class 10.</P>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MHZ2
branchItem.description: <P>The 11/22-MHZ2 series is a clean room series standard type parallel air gripper, taking the place of the MHQ(G)2 series. A linear guide provides high rigidity and high accuracy. MHZ2 can operate under higher pressure even at a larger holding point and overhang. High degree of mounting precision is achieved and mounting repeatability is improved. </P>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MHL2
branchItem.description: <P>Clean Room series 11/22-MHL2 air grippers are designed for applications that require a wide travel range of gripper fingers. The MHL is ideal for gripping many different sized parts. Finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism. The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with large holding force. Available in bore sizes 10, 16, 20, 25, 32 and 40. Axial mounting (tapped body or through hole) or lateral mounting options available. Auto switch capable. </P>
